projects.name: Social Network Website Project
contributes: Created a distributed social network website based on Django.
Introduced Bootstrap to the team, delegated and monitored the work of six group members.
Individually designed and implemented RESTful API and authorization feature using Django REST framework on the backend, wrote functions for jQuery AJAX calls on the front end.

projects.name: StarCraft AI
contributes: Individually designed and implemented strategies against Zerg, received King Slayer Reward in the competition.
Identified issues and led four team members to prioritize and resolve problems.
Quickly understood and mastered the basic UAlbertaBot AI framework and turn high-level tactical strategies into code implementation.

projects.name: DVD Collector Android APP
contributes: Led a team to develop an application in Android Studio based on waterfall development model and acquire the ability to develop team project with git version control tool at high proficiency level.
Applied object-oriented concept and the MVC pattern to design the 3-tiers layer structure, drew a detailed UML diagram to show teammates my design ideas.
Quickly learned APIs of Elastic Search and use it as the basis backend for development.
